author: jdcasey
msg: Moving PluginLoader interface to maven-core; it seems that creating a separate maven-plugin-manager project isn't feasible yet (too many ties back into maven-core via MavenSession).

author: snoopdave
msg: OpenJPA now passing all tests against Derby and MySQL

author: mrglavas
msg: An NPE would always be thrown from the normailzer during namespace fixup if the
document contained any non-namespace aware Attr nodes. This was occuring while
checking the well-formedness of the attribute's name. I've changed the code so
that it's consistent with how we check element names. If an attribute's local
name is null we'll detect that now.

author: jdcasey
msg: Starting an experimental lifecycle refactor...committing this so I can continue to move classes between projects.

author: jdcasey
msg: Creating a branch to experiment with lifecycle-handling refactors.
